body_html:
@drpngx I have installed tf from source. Did I need to installed it from source again if I make changes to scatter_nd_op.cc file?
Also, should I add sth like this to that file:
#define REGISTER_SCATTER_ND_GPU(type) REGISTER_SCATTER_ND(type, GPU);
TF_CALL_NUMBER_TYPES(REGISTER_SCATTER_ND_ADD_SUB_GPU);
// TODO(simister): Re-enable all types after binary size is under control.
TF_CALL_NUMBER_TYPES(REGISTER_SCATTER_ND_UPDATE_GPU);
TF_CALL_NUMBER_TYPES(REGISTER_SCATTER_ND_GPU);

Thanks,
Ali
